column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////Tried to order delivery through door dash. Door dash accepts the order
column2: but then the restaurant calls to say though they're on door dash they don't use door dash drivers
column3: and their drivers are unwilling to deliver an order at 3p bc of a parade at 5:30. This makes no sense. Now I'm left w no dinner and a hassle to try to cancel door dash. Ridiculous experience. Order from Genos East instead.
